transcript.text: Burns are skin injuries mainly caused by
heat due to flames, chemical contact,
etc. Every day over 30,000 people suffer
new burns that require medical
attention. Around 180,000 mortalities
occur in low and middle inome countries
whereas non-fatal burns are a leading
cause of mobidity. One of the reasons is
due to wound coverage. In UK wounds are
accountable for 3% of the total health
system. Within this figure, wound
dressing occupies 15% of the wound
treating resources. In Denmark, an
average of 3.53 dressing changes were
performed weekly with 23% of wounds
having dressing changed daily.
Moreover, the patients experience
distress and discomfort whenever the
dressings are removed and the hospital
length of stay which depends on the
patients healing rates can induce high
treatment costs that can be unaffordable
for them.
Hence we would like to propose tilapish
skin bandaid and innovative wound
healing genograph as the current
substitute for burn patients.
[Music]
Tilapia fish is a marine species
cultivated in most tropical and
subtropical countries. The fish skin of
this delicacy is an unedible byproduct.
This fish skin contains a high level of
type one collagen morphologically
similar to those in humans. Note that
collagen functions to support connective
tissue, retain moisture, and most
importantly facilitate healing.
Based on our research paper, no dressing
changes were performed. Not only fish
skin has a good adherence that can
better prevent wound infection, it can
reduce financial cost and raises a
longer quality adjusted life year.
While in healthc care's perspective, it
can shorten nursing time which can in
turn increase their productivity
especially at moments with limited
nursing resources.
[Music]
Nonetheless, only few related and
relevant number of studies were done.
Further testing and research are needed
to guarantee that this biological
dressing is safe. In terms of future
outlook, the demands of tilapia fish
skin bandaid can lead to the expansion
of fish farming. A disease outbreak
would normally occurs when there are too
many cultivated fish. This is something
to be considered in future by respective
authorities.
As an overview, we hope our audience
learns something from the video. We hope
that you can support this healthcare
implementation while feeling less
resistant to the fishy appearance of
tilapia fish skin band-aid.
[Music]
